column2:
```r

# Calculate autocorrelation of delta_letters by district and then average over all districts
# This should be roughly the same as above.  This is the final value we use
corr_dist_deltas <- dist_deltas %>% 
  filter(year >= 2008) %>% 
  summarise(auto = cor(delta_letters, delta_letters_lagged)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  summarise(mean_auto=mean(auto))


# Calcualte the overall variance of the deltas
var_dist_deltas <- var(dist_deltas$delta_letters/100, na.rm = TRUE)

# Estimate the proportion of non-persistent variance due to sampling
(corr_dist_deltas*var_dist_deltas +.0011)/(corr_dist_deltas*var_dist_deltas)
```
